OB: The File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same.
EB: Expect consistent behavior on all pages where the page height does not change when the page is selected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the preference page for File Editors in the Workbench.
2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.
3. Switch back to Internal Editors (without making a selection) and press OK.

The selected external editor should now be added, but the page height should not change.
